The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New_York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Sunday at Madison_Square_Garden in New_York . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three_point line , while the Knicks went 41 percent from the floor and 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks were also able to force the Knicks into 18 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own . Brandon_Knight went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three_point line to score a team - high of 17 points , while also adding 5 assists . Giannis_Antetokounmpo on the other hand finished with 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3PT , 3 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . Notching a double_double , Zaza_Pachulia finished with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Kendall_Marshall had arguably his best game of the season , going 6 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the free_throw line to score 15 points , while grabbing 3 assists . Tim_Hardaway_Jr. finished with 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 3 - 5 3PT , 2 - 4 FT ) , 4 assists and 1 blocked shot , while JR_Smith finished with 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) , 7 rebounds and 4 assists . The 17 points matched a season - high for him , while the double_double was his thirteenth of the year . JR_Smith had 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 7 3PT ) , 7 rebounds and 4 assists , while Cole_Aldrich added 12 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3PT ) and 7 rebounds .

Detroit won the second quarter 23 - 23 , but it was n't enough and Detroit won the remaining 2 quarters ( 28 - 18 and 33 - 21 , respectively ) to walk away with a huge win against 1 of the biggest title teams in the NBA . LeBron_James led the way for the Pistons with 21 points , 5 assists and 2 rebounds , while Andre_Drummond had 20 points , 16 rebounds and 4 assists . Kentavious_Caldwell-Pope had 15 points , and Marcus_Morris filled the stat sheet nicely after finishing with 12 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . Ish_Smith added 12 points off the bench . LeBron_James was the best player for the Cavaliers , as he finished with 29 points , 14 rebounds , and 10 assists . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 - 3 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 3 ) 103 - 95 on Wednesday at the TD_Garden in Boston . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three_point line , while the Celtics went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . LeBron_James led the way , going 13 - for - 26 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three_point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and 2 blocked shots . It marked his third double_double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 24 points , 11 rebounds and 4 assists per game . The only other Rocket to reach double_figures in points was Jared_Sullinger , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3PT , 2 - 2 FT ) and 8 rebounds in 17 minutes .

The Cavaliers ( 51 - 27 ) were led by LeBron_James , as he tallied 36 points , 10 rebounds , 6 assists and 2 blocks . Kyrie_Irving accrued 19 points , 5 assists and 2 steals . Kevin_Love totaled 15 points and 16 rebounds . Channing_Frye got a rare start and totaled 10 points , 8 rebounds and 2 steals in 17 minutes of action . The Celtics ( 50 - 28 ) got a gem out of Isaiah_Thomas , as he accrued 26 points , 4 rebounds and 6 assists . Jae_Crowder finished with 13 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists . Avery_Bradley was the only other player in double_figures , as he amassed 13 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists .

Brooklyn jumped to a 30 - 22 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Brooklyn jumped to a 8 - point lead at the break , and they never looked back . Brooklyn won the third quarter 28 - 20 , but it was n't enough and Brooklyn closed things out with a 24 - 20 win in the final 12 minutes . Rondae_Hollis-Jefferson was the top scorer for the Nets , as he finished with 16 points and 12 rebounds . Allen_Crabbe had 13 points , and DeMarre_Carroll filled the stat sheet nicely after finishing with 15 points and 8 boards . Spencer_Dinwiddie filled the stat sheet thanks to 11 points , 12 assists , and 6 rebounds . Jarrett_Allen had 11 points off the bench . Bradley_Beal was the best player for the Wizards since he finished with 28 points and 4 assists . Otto_Porter_Jr. chipped in with 11 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Kelly_Oubre_Jr. had 12 points and 9 rebounds coming off the bench . Otto_Porter_Jr. chipped in with 11 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves , 118 - 112 , at Target_Center on Friday . The Sixers ( 14 - 13 ) were led by Joel_Embiid , as he collected 28 points , 12 rebounds and 8 assists . JJ_Redick amassed 26 points , 2 rebounds and 3 assists . Richaun_Holmes amassed 15 points , 11 rebounds and 2 assists . Trevor_Booker led the bench with 12 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 2 steals . The Timberwolves ( 16 - 12 ) were led by Jimmy_Butler , as he tallied 38 points , 6 rebounds and 3 assists . Andrew_Wiggins totaled 20 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Karl-Anthony_Towns collected 19 points , 16 rebounds , 2 assists , 4 steals and 3 blocks . Jeff_Teague accrued 17 points and 3 assists while Taj_Gibson generated 7 points , 12 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 93 - 87 , at Verizon_Center on Friday . The Wizards ( 15 - 13 ) and the Grizzlies ( 8 - 20 ) engaged in quite a battle that was n't decided until the final minutes of the fourth quarter . Memphis jumped to a 22 - 12 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Memphis jumped to a 12 - point lead at half time , and they extended it to a 12 - point advantage at the break . Bradley_Beal was the best player for the Wizards since he finished with 18 points , 7 assists and 4 rebounds , while Marcin_Gortat chipped in with 12 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . John_Wall had 13 points and 8 rebounds , and Marcin_Gortat filled the stat sheet nicely after finishing with 12 points , 8 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 blocks . John_Wall led the way for the Grizzlies with 18 points , 7 assists and 4 rebounds , but it was n't enough . JaMychal_Green had a strong double_double of 15 points and 15 rebounds , while Chandler_Parsons chipped in with 12 points , 5 rebounds and 2 assists . Chandler_Parsons had 12 points , and Chandler_Parsons added 12 points with 5 boards .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Miami Heat , 102 - 95 , at American_Airlines_Arena on Saturday evening . The Trail_Blazers got out to a great start at home , with a 33 - 21 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on through the second , where they outscored the visitors by 2 , to take a 10 - point lead into halftime . The Trail_Blazers came out strong in the third and managed to make it a 2 - point game heading into the fourth . CJ_McCollum led the Trail_Blazers with 28 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals , in 41 minutes . Damian_Lillard followed up with 18 points , 6 assists and 3 rebounds , while Al-Farouq_Aminu tallied 15 points , 13 rebounds and 0 block . The Trail_Blazers shot 50 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Wayne_Ellington led the Heat with 24 points on 8 - of - 11 shooting , in 32 minutes off the bench . Dion_Waiters tallied 17 points , 3 assists and 2 rebounds , while James_Johnson tallied 10 points , 10 rebounds and 8 assists . The Heat shot 47 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range .

The Cavaliers ( 21 - 8 ) and the Lakers ( 10 - 17 ) engaged in quite a battle that was n't decided until the final minutes of the fourth quarter . Los_Angeles jumped to a 26 - 24 lead in the first quarter , and they would never look back . Cleveland won the second quarter 39 - 39 , but it was n't enough and Cleveland won the remaining 2 quarters ( 31 - 26 and 27 - 26 and 27 - 26 , respectively ) to walk away with a huge win against 1 of the biggest title contenders in the NBA . Kevin_Love led the way for the Cavaliers with 28 points , 11 rebounds , 3 assists and 2 steals . LeBron_James had 25 points , 12 assists and 12 rebounds , but he also committed 5 turnovers . Jose_Calderon had 17 points , 6 assists and 2 steals , while Jae_Crowder chipped in with 11 points . Dwyane_Wade had 10 points off the bench . Brandon_Ingram was the top scorer for the Lakers , as he finished with 26 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists . Lonzo_Ball had 13 points and 11 assists . Josh_Hart had 11 points and 10 rebounds . Julius_Randle had 13 points and Julius_Randle had 13 points coming off the bench .

The San_Antonio Spurs defeated the visiting Phoenix Suns , 103 - 89 , at AT_&_T_Center on Saturday evening . The Spurs got out to a great start at home , with a 26 - 26 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on through the second , where they outscored the visitors by 7 , to take a 49 - 42 lead by halftime . The Spurs stayed in control through the third , as they outscored the Suns 30 - 30 in the quarter , to take a 72 - 72 lead into the final frame . Kawhi_Leonard led the Spurs with 21 points , 3 rebounds , 3 assists , 4 steals and 3 blocks , in 29 minutes . Manu_Ginobili followed up with 21 points , 3 assists , 2 steals , 1 block and 1 rebound , in 19 minutes off the bench , while Bryn_Forbes added 16 points , 3 rebounds , 3 steals and 1 assist , in 32 minutes . The Spurs shot 47 percent from the field , including 11 - of - 30 from long range . Meanwhile , Devin_Booker led the Suns with 21 points , 5 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , in 35 minutes . Marquese_Chriss added 12 points , 7 rebounds , 2 steals , 1 block and 1 assist , while Alex_Len added 10 points and 5 rebounds . The Suns shot 42 percent from the field , including 7 - of - 30 from long range .

The Pistons ( 21 - 17 ) and the Rockets ( 27 - 11 ) engaged in quite a battle that was n't decided until the final minutes of the fourth quarter . Detroit jumped to a 31 - 31 lead in the first quarter , and they never looked back . Detroit won the second quarter 26 - 21 , but it was n't enough and Detroit won the remaining 2 quarters ( 31 - 19 and 27 - 24 , respectively ) and ended winning comfortably . The Pistons won the final quarter 24 - 20 , but it was n't enough and the Pistons closed things out with ease . Chris_Paul led the way for the Pistons since he finished with 16 points , 13 assists and 7 rebounds , but he also committed 5 turnovers . Trevor_Ariza added 15 points , while Eric_Gordon chipped in with 15 points and 7 boards . Gerald_Green ( 16 points ) and Boban_Marjanovic ( 10 points ) thrived coming off the bench as well . The Pelicans picked it up in the second , but could not make a dent in the deficit , as the Hawks matched each other with 39 points each in the quarter . The Hawks carried the momentum into the third , where they outscored the Pelicans by 9 , to take a 94 - 86 lead into the final frame . Kevin_Huerter led the Hawks with 27 points on 11 - of - 18 shooting , 4 rebounds , 3 assists and 1 steal , in 30 minutes . John_Collins followed up with 23 points , 10 rebounds and 4 blocks , while Trae_Young tallied 10 points , 10 assists and 5 rebounds . The Hawks shot 49 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 41 from long range . Meanwhile , Julius_Randle led the Pelicans with 23 points , 3 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block , in 35 minutes . Elfrid_Payton followed up with 23 points , 6 rebounds and 2 assists , while Anthony_Davis tallied 15 points , 8 rebounds , 4 assists , 4 blocks and 1 steal . The Pelicans shot 45 percent from the field , including 18 - of - 41 from long range .

The Golden_State Warriors defeated the visiting Houston Rockets , 104 - 100 , in Game 1 of the Western_Conference semi finals , at Oracle_Arena on Saturday evening . The Warriors got out to a good start at home , with a 28 - 19 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on in the second , where they outscored the Rockets by 9 , to take a 53 - 53 lead by halftime . The Rockets came out strong in the third and outscored the visitors by 9 in the quarter , to take a 83 - 76 lead into the final frame . Kevin_Durant led the Warriors with 35 points , 5 rebounds , 3 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 43 minutes . Stephen_Curry followed up with 18 points , 7 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , while Draymond_Green tallied 14 points , 9 rebounds , 9 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . The Warriors shot 51 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 47 from long range . Meanwhile , James_Harden led the Rockets with 35 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds and 3 steals , in 39 minutes . Eric_Gordon followed up with 27 points , 4 rebounds and 2 blocks , while Chris_Paul tallied 17 points , 4 assists , 3 rebounds and 3 steals . The Rockets shot 42 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 47 from long range .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Boston Celtics , 123 - 116 , in Game 3 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs at TD_Garden on Friday . Milwaukee ended up shooting 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from three_point range while holding Boston to 43 percent from the field and 40 percent from long range . The Bucks ( 2 - 1 ) were led by Giannis_Antetokounmpo , as he tallied 32 points , 13 rebounds , 8 assists , 2 steals and 3 blocks . Khris_Middleton accrued 20 points , 4 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals . Khris_Middleton totaled 20 points , 4 rebounds , 5 assists and 3 steals . Pat_Connaughton led the bench with 14 points and 7 boards . The Celtics ( 1 - 2 ) were led by Kyrie_Irving , as he collected 29 points , 3 rebounds , 6 assists and 3 steals . Jayson_Tatum accrued 20 points , 11 rebounds , 3 assists and 3 steals . Jaylen_Brown finished with 18 points , 5 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals while Marcus_Morris generated 16 points , 8 rebounds , 2 assists and 2 steals . Gordon_Hayward led the bench with 10 points , 7 rebounds and 5 assists .
The Golden_State Warriors defeated the host Houston Rockets , 118 - 113 , at Toyota_Center on Saturday evening . The Rockets got out to a good start at home , with a 27 - 27 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on in the second , where they outscored the Rockets by 1 , to take a 57 - 57 lead into halftime . The Warriors stayed strong in the third , as they outscored the Warriors 30 - 25 in the quarter , to take a 82 - 87 lead into the final frame . Stephen_Curry led the Warriors with 33 points , 5 rebounds and 4 assists , in 34 minutes . Klay_Thompson followed up with 27 points , 2 rebounds , 2 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal , while Andre_Iguodala added 17 points , 5 steals , 2 rebounds and 2 assists . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field , including 17 - of - 38 from long range . Meanwhile , James_Harden led the Rockets with 35 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 4 steals , in 39 minutes . Chris_Paul followed up with 27 points , 11 rebounds and 6 assists , while PJ_Tucker tallied 15 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals . The Rockets shot 47 percent from the field , including 16 - of - 38 from deep .
The Portland Trail_Blazers defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 100 - 96 , at Pepsi_Center on Saturday evening . The Nuggets got out to a good start at home , with a 29 - 17 lead after 1 quarter . However , the Trail_Blazers closed the quarter strong and took a 29 - 17 lead into the second . The Nuggets stayed in control through the second , where they outscored the Nuggets by 4 , to take a 48 - 39 lead by halftime . The Nuggets came out strong in the third quarter , as they outscored the Nuggets 32 - 24 in the quarter , to take a 71 - 72 lead into the final frame . CJ_McCollum led the Trail_Blazers with 37 points , 9 rebounds , 1 assist , 1 steal and 1 block , in 45 minutes . Damian_Lillard tallied 13 points , 10 rebounds , 8 assists and 3 steals , while Evan_Turner chipped in 14 points , 7 rebounds , 2 assists and 1 block , in 19 minutes off the bench . The Trail_Blazers shot 41 percent from the field , including 4 - of - 26 from long range . Meanwhile , Nikola_Jokic led the Nuggets with 29 points , 13 rebounds , 4 blocks and 2 assists , in 42 minutes . Jamal_Murray followed up with 17 points , 6 rebounds and 5 assists , while Paul_Millsap tallied 10 points , 7 rebounds , 3 blocks and 1 assist . The Nuggets shot 37 percent from the field , including 6 - of - 33 from long range .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Milwaukee Bucks in overtime , 118 - 112 , at Scotiabank Arena on Friday evening . The Raptors got out to a great start at home , with a 30 - 21 lead after 1 quarter . They turned the tables in the second , where they outscored the Raptors by 4 , to take a 7 - point lead into halftime . The Bucks came out strong in the third and outscored the Bucks by 4 in the quarter , to take a 75 - 75 lead into the final frame . Kawhi_Leonard led the Raptors with 36 points , 9 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 steals and 1 block , in 52 minutes . Pascal_Siakam followed up with 25 points , 11 rebounds , 3 steals , 1 assist and 1 block , while Marc_Gasol finished with 16 points , 12 rebounds , 7 assists , 5 blocks and 3 steals . The Bucks shot 37 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 44 from long range . Meanwhile , Kawhi_Leonard led the Bucks with 36 points , 9 rebounds , 2 assists , 1 steal and 1 block , in 37 minutes . Malcolm_Brogdon followed up with 20 points , 5 rebounds , 2 steals and 1 assist , while Giannis_Antetokounmpo tallied 12 points , 23 rebounds , 7 assists , 4 blocks and 1 steal . The Raptors shot 39 percent from the field , including 14 - of - 44 from long range .

The Bucks picked it up in the second , but could not make a dent in the deficit , as the Raptors pushed their lead to double_digit , to take a 65 - 55 lead into halftime . The Toronto Raptors defeated the host Milwaukee Bucks , 105 - 99 , in Game 6 of the Eastern_Conference first - round playoffs at BMO_Harris_Bradley_Center on Sunday . A 32 - 22 first quarter really set the tone , as the Raptors never got the game within 7 points from there . The Raptors ( 3 - 2 ) were led by Kawhi_Leonard , as he tallied 35 points , 7 rebounds , 9 assists and 2 steals . Kyle_Lowry finished with 17 points , 7 rebounds and 6 assists . Pascal_Siakam accrued 14 points , 13 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 blocks while Fred_VanVleet led the bench with 21 points . The Bucks ( 2 - 3 ) were led by Giannis_Antetokounmpo , as he accumulated 24 points , 6 rebounds and 6 assists . Eric_Bledsoe totaled 20 points , 4 rebounds and 2 assists . Malcolm_Brogdon accumulated 18 points , 11 rebounds and 6 assists while Brook_Lopez totaled 16 points and 8 boards .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the visiting Golden_State Warriors , 118 - 109 , at Scotiabank Arena on Saturday evening . The Raptors got out to a good start at home , with a 25 - 21 lead after 1 quarter . They kept the pressure on in the second and pushed their lead to 59 - 49 by halftime . The Warriors came out strong in the third and managed to take a 88 - 81 lead into the final frame . Pascal_Siakam led the Raptors with 32 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists , 2 blocks and 1 steal , in 40 minutes . Kawhi_Leonard followed up with 23 points , 8 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal , while Marc_Gasol tallied 10 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists and 1 steal . The Raptors shot 51 percent from the field , including 13 - of - 31 from long range . Meanwhile , Stephen_Curry led the Warriors with 34 points , 5 rebounds , 5 assists and 1 steal , in 40 minutes . Klay_Thompson followed up with 21 points , 5 rebounds and 1 assist , while Draymond_Green tallied 10 points , 10 rebounds , 10 assists and 1 steal . The Warriors shot 44 percent from the field , including 12 - of - 31 from deep .

A 26 - 26 first quarter really set the foundation , as the Warriors held a double_digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The Warriors ended up shooting 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from three_point range while holding the Raptors to 37 percent from the field and 29 percent from long range . The Warriors ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Klay_Thompson , as he tallied 25 points , 5 rebounds and 5 assists . Stephen_Curry finished with 23 points , 3 rebounds , 4 assists and 3 steals . DeMarcus_Cousins collected 17 points , 10 rebounds and 9 assists . Andre_Iguodala started and totaled 8 points , 8 rebounds and 6 assists . The Raptors ( 1 - 1 ) were led by Kawhi_Leonard , as he tallied 34 points , 14 rebounds and 3 assists . Pascal_Siakam accumulated 12 points , 8 rebounds and 5 assists . Fred_VanVleet led the bench with 17 points , 4 rebounds , 2 assists and 3 steals .

They kept the pressure on in the second , where they outscored the Raptors by 10 , to take a 62 - 56 lead by halftime . The Warriors stayed in control through the third , as they outscored the Warriors by 4 in the quarter , to take a 1 - point lead heading into the final frame . Stephen_Curry led the Warriors with 31 points , 8 rebounds and 7 assists , in 41 minutes . Klay_Thompson followed up with 26 points , 6 rebounds , 4 assists and 1 steal , while Draymond_Green finished with 10 points , 10 rebounds , 8 assists , 1 steal and 1 block . Meanwhile , Kawhi_Leonard led the Raptors with 26 points , 12 rebounds , 6 assists , 2 steals and 2 blocks , in 41 minutes . Kyle_Lowry followed up with 18 points , 6 assists , 4 rebounds , 2 blocks and 1 steal , while Draymond_Green added 17 points , 8 rebounds and 2 assists .
